name: Pruning Shears
description: Pruning shears are used for cutting and shaping plants, especially for removing small branches or dead foliage.

name: Hoe
description: A hoe is a versatile tool used for digging, cultivating, and weeding in the garden.

name: Garden Trowel
description: A garden trowel is a small hand tool with a pointed, scoop-shaped metal blade.

name: Watering Can
description: A watering can is a container with a spout used to water plants. It is a common tool for providing a controlled flow of water to the soil.

name: Garden Gloves
description: Garden gloves are worn to protect hands from dirt, thorns, and other potential hazards while gardening.

name: Wheelbarrow
description: A wheelbarrow is a small, one-wheeled cart designed for carrying materials, such as soil, plants, or gardening tools.

name: Rake
description: A rake is a tool with a row of metal or wooden teeth used for collecting leaves, grass, or other debris in the garden.

name: Garden Fork
description: A garden fork is a digging tool with sharp, pointed prongs used for turning and loosening soil.
